enum.summary: Defines all the different types of file io which can occur.

field.name: Block
field.value: This indicates that the data is to be read/written as is from/to the file.

field.name: Lines
field.value: This indicates that the data is to be read/written as individual lines from/to the file.

field.name: Line
field.value: This indicates that the data is to be read/written as a single line from/to the file.

field.name: Data
field.value: This indicates that the data is to be read/written as is from/to the file.

field.name: Stream
field.value: This indicates that the data is to be read/written from/to the stream.
